text: The royal wedding will go down in history, especially with Meghan Markle being the first African-American woman to marry into the family. Though Prince Harry didn't wear an engagement ring, he does wear a wedding band, which is apparently uncommon for this royal family. Meghan and Harry having been shaking things up from the beginning!
title: Lindsey Vonn Proposes To Fiancé P. K. Subban With An Engagement Ring As A Symbol Of 'Equality'

meta_data.description: If she like it, then she better put a ring on it!
